publicMode.banner: Configure your FarmDroid and see what it costs
publicMode.formSubheading: Enter your details to see the price and receive your configuration overview.

persistence.resumeMessage: You have a saved configuration from {time}. Would you like to continue where you left off?

seedConfig.title: +Seed Configuration
seedConfig.subtitle: Configure rows and spacing for 100+ different crops

baseRobot.productDescription: The autonomous seeding & weeding robot for precision farming

pfw.name: Passive Front Wheel
pfw.subtitle: Best for flat fields with wider row spacing (45-50 cm)
pfw.description: The standard wheel configuration provides stability and smooth guidance on flat terrain. Ideal for crops with even row counts and wider row spacing, such as sugar beets (45-50 cm).

afw.name: Active Front Wheel
afw.subtitle: Auto-tilting front wheel for slopes above 8% and inclines above 5%
afw.description: For hilly terrains, the Active Front Wheel adds an actuator that automatically tilts the front wheel to maintain stability. Recommended for slopes above 8% and side inclines over 5%, and for crops with even row numbers and wider spacing (around 45-50 cm).

dfw.name: Dual Front Wheel
dfw.subtitle: Flat fields with narrow row spacing (down to 22.5 cm) & bed systems
dfw.description: Equipped with two front wheels instead of one, this setup enhances balance and precision, particularly for crops with narrow row spacing down to 22.5 cm. Perfect for flat fields and bed systems, works well with both even and uneven row counts.

infoPanel.title: Wheel Configurations
infoPanel.intro: Every field is different, and so is every FarmDroid. The FD20 can be tailored to your specific conditions with adjustable wheel distances, row numbers, and a choice of three front wheel configurations.
infoPanel.adjustmentRange: Your ideal setup depends on several parameters, including crop type, row spacing, soil conditions, and the slope of your field. The FD20's dual back wheels can be adjusted between 160-230 cm in 10 cm increments.
infoPanel.footer: With these configuration options, you can fine-tune your FarmDroid to match your terrain, crops, and working style. Our robot specialists are always ready to help you design the setup that fits your farm best.

selectionInfo.dfw: 4-wheel configuration provides maximum flexibility. Ideal for bed configurations.
selectionInfo.afw: Active front wheel provides better traction in fields with slopes and inclines.
selectionInfo.pfw: Passive front wheel runs between rows. This is the standard and 'original' FarmDroid FD20 front wheel configuration. Typically used for crops with row spacings 45-50 cm

powerBank.name: + Power Bank
powerBank.description: Extended: Adds ~10h daily operation on cloudy days

info.hybrid: Hybrid configuration adds generator backup for maximum uptime in all conditions.
info.powerBank: Extended electric operation with double battery capacity - the Power bank can be charged externally at your farm and connected to your FarmDroid.
info.solar: Pure solar power provides clean, quiet operation ideal for most farming conditions.

solar.name: Solar Power
solar.description: The standard FarmDroid power configuration uses a 1.6 kW solar panel array combined with a 6.0 kWh lithium battery pack. This setup provides 12-24 hours of daily operation depending on weather conditions and season, making it ideal for most farming operations.
solar.tipText: If capacity is not an issue on cloudy days.

powerBank.name: Power Bank
powerBank.description: The FarmDroid Power Bank is an additional battery unit that doubles your robot's energy capacity. It provides an extra 6.0 kWh of power, enabling extended operation times of approximately 10 additional hours per day while maintaining zero emissions.
powerBank.tipText: If capacity is a priority also on cloudy days. Especially in March and April pure solar power can be limitied by the amount of energy produced from solar. With the Power bank, if charged externally, the robot can run 20-24 hours, even on cloudy days.

hybrid.name: Hybrid (Solar + Generator)
hybrid.description: The hybrid power configuration combines solar panels with a generator backup system. This setup ensures 24+ hours of continuous operation regardless of weather conditions, making it the most reliable option for demanding agricultural operations.
hybrid.tipText: Large-scale operations requiring maximum uptime, regions with unpredictable weather, or time-critical farming windows where continuous operation is essential.

combiTool.name: Combi Tool
combiTool.description: Multi-purpose tool attachment for enhanced weeding

weedCuttingDisc.name: Weed Cutting Disc
weedCuttingDisc.description: Precision cutting disc for effective weed control

info.both: Full weeding setup with mechanical tools and precision spraying for maximum weed control.
info.sprayOnly: The +SPRAY system enables targeted herbicide application with GPS precision, reducing chemical usage by up to 90%.
info.combiOnly: Enhanced mechanical weeding with Combi Tool attachments for improved soil management and weed control.
info.weedCuttingDiscOnly: Precision cutting discs provide effective mechanical weed control between rows.
info.standard: Standard mechanical weeding configuration, perfect for organic certification requirements.

standardWeeding.name: Standard Weeding
standardWeeding.description: The standard weeding configuration is included with every FarmDroid and provides effective mechanical weed control. It uses precision weeding wires that disturb the soil surface between rows, combined with inrow knives that cut weeds close to the crop plants.
standardWeeding.tipText: Organic farms and operations focused on chemical-free weed management. The standard setup handles most common weed pressure effectively.

combiTool.name: Combi Tool
combiTool.description: The Combi Tool is an advanced mechanical weeding attachment that adds notched discs and L-shares to your FarmDroid. The notched discs pre-cut the soil ahead of the weeding operation, while the L-shares provide additional soil movement for better weed burial.
combiTool.tipText: Fields with heavy weed pressure or compacted soil. The Combi Tool provides more aggressive mechanical action for challenging conditions.

weedCuttingDisc.name: Weed Cutting Disc
weedCuttingDisc.description: The Weed Cutting Disc is a precision cutting tool that provides effective inter-row weed control. Available in 225mm and 250mm variants depending on your row spacing, these discs cut weeds at the soil surface for clean, efficient weed management.
weedCuttingDisc.tipText: Operations requiring clean cutting action with minimal soil disturbance. Ideal for crops sensitive to soil movement or where precision is critical.

spraySystem.name: +Spray System
spraySystem.description: The +SPRAY system adds precision spraying capability to your FarmDroid. With a 110L tank and GPS-guided nozzles, it enables targeted application of herbicides, fertilizers, or other liquids with up to 90% reduction in chemical usage compared to broadcast spraying.
spraySystem.tipText: Conventional farms looking to reduce chemical usage, or operations requiring targeted application of liquid fertilizers or crop protection products.

accessories.title: Accessories
accessories.subtitle: Additional equipment for your FarmDroid

starterKit.name: Starter Kit
starterKit.description: Essential care package with base station V3 and field setup tools

fstFieldSetupTool.name: FST - Field Setup Tool
fstFieldSetupTool.description: Precision field setup tool for optimal robot calibration

baseStationV3.name: Base Station V3 Set
baseStationV3.description: GPS base station for high-precision navigation

essentialCarePackage.name: Essential Care Package
essentialCarePackage.description: Complete maintenance kit for robot upkeep

essentialCareSpray.name: Essential Care Package for +Spray
essentialCareSpray.description: Maintenance kit specifically for the spray system

toolbox.name: Toolbox with Tools
toolbox.description: Complete tool set for field maintenance

roadTransport.name: Road Transport Platform
roadTransport.description: Transport platform for moving FD20 between fields on public roads

fieldBracket.name: Field Bracket with Chain
fieldBracket.description: Secure mounting bracket for field positioning

powerBank.name: Power Bank
powerBank.description: Additional battery capacity for extended operation

accessories.starterKitIncludes: Includes: FST Field Setup Tool, Base Station V3, Essential Care Package, Field Bracket
accessories.emptyMessage: Accessories are optional. You can add them later through our service department.
accessories.selectedCountOnly: {count, plural, =1 {# accessory item selected.} other {# accessory items selected.}}

bundles.title: Starter Kit
bundles.description: The Starter Kit bundles together everything you need to get your FarmDroid up and running quickly. It includes essential connectivity equipment, field setup tools, and maintenance supplies at a bundled price.

tip.label: Pro tip:
tip.text: The Starter Kit saves you money compared to buying items separately and ensures you have all the essentials from day one.

connectivity.title: Connectivity
connectivity.description: Reliable connectivity is essential for your FarmDroid to operate autonomously. The Base Station provides centimeter-accurate GPS positioning, while the Field Setup Tool helps you configure your field boundaries precisely.

transport.title: Transport
transport.description: Move your FarmDroid safely between fields and storage locations. The Field Bracket secures your robot during short moves, while the Road Transport Platform is required for transporting on public roads.

maintenance.title: Maintenance & Tools
maintenance.description: Keep your FarmDroid running at peak performance with proper maintenance equipment. The Essential Care Package includes all the spare parts and consumables you'll need for regular upkeep.

fstFieldSetupTool.name: FST - Field Setup Tool
fstFieldSetupTool.description: The FST (Field Setup Tool) is a precision GPS device designed to help you accurately map your field boundaries and configure work zones. It connects directly to your FarmDroid system and ensures your robot knows exactly where to operate.

baseStationV3.name: Base Station V3 Set
baseStationV3.description: The Base Station V3 is an RTK GPS base station that provides centimeter-level positioning accuracy for your FarmDroid. It broadcasts correction signals that enable precise autonomous navigation across your field.

essentialCarePackage.name: Essential Care Package
essentialCarePackage.description: The Essential Care Package is a comprehensive maintenance kit containing all the spare parts and consumables you'll need for regular robot upkeep. Keep your FarmDroid running smoothly throughout the season.

fieldBracket.name: Field Bracket with Chain
fieldBracket.description: The Field Bracket provides a secure mounting point for moving your FarmDroid short distances using a tractor or ATV. Essential for repositioning your robot within your property without using the transport platform.
features: Rated for towing on soft ground

roadTransport.name: Road Transport Platform
roadTransport.description: The Road Transport Platform is a certified trailer solution for legally transporting your FarmDroid on public roads. Required when moving your robot between distant fields or to service locations.

additionalWeightKit.name: Additional Weight Kit
additionalWeightKit.description: The Additional Weight Kit includes 4 × 17.5kg weights that can be attached to your FarmDroid to increase traction in challenging soil conditions. Ideal for wet, loose, or sloped terrain.

toolbox.name: Toolbox with Tools
toolbox.description: A complete set of tools specifically selected for FarmDroid field maintenance and minor adjustments. Everything you need to keep your robot running during the season.

servicePlan.title: Service & Warranty
servicePlan.subtitle: Choose your support and protection plan

premium.name: Care Premium
premium.description: Full support with software upgrades and Agrirouter

warranty.title: Warranty Extension
warranty.description: Covers parts and replacement. Requires FD20 to be serviced annually.

lineItems.starterKitIncludes: Incl. FST Tool, Base Station, Care Pkg, Field Bracket

rowConfig.title: +Seed Configuration
rowConfig.subtitle: Configure rows and spacing for 100+ different crops
rowConfig.seedsPerGroupTooltip: Number of seeds per group when using group seeding mode.
rowConfig.spacingTooltip: Distance between plants along each row. Min 3cm.
rowConfig.patternTooltip: Grid or diamond formation for optimal plant spacing.
rowConfig.precisionWarning: Precision seeding only possible at 10cm or above

seedSizeTip.label: Tip:
seedSizeTip.text: 6mm works for small seeds like carrots, onions, and spinach. 14mm handles larger seeds like beets, beans, and corn.

rowConfig.optimalWheelSpacing: Optimal wheel spacing for this row config

emptyState.title: Configure Your Seeding Setup
emptyState.description: Add rows to define how your FarmDroid will seed your crops. You can adjust spacing, seed size, and more.

rowConfig.tutorialDrag: Drag rows left/right to adjust spacing
rowConfig.tutorialAdd: Click + to add rows between existing ones
rowConfig.tutorialWheels: Drag wheels to adjust wheel spacing

6mm.name: +Seed 6mm System
6mm.description: Compatible with seeds from 0.5 mm up to 6 mm such as flower seeds, rapeseed, lettuce, endives/chicory, cabbage, onion, spinach, sugar beet, red beet, fodder beet and more.

14mm.name: +Seed 14mm System
14mm.description: Compatible with seeds from 0.8 mm up to 14 mm such as rapeseed, lettuce, endives/chicory, cabbage, onion, spinach, sugar beet, red beet, fodder beet, soya beans, green beans, field beans, chickpeas, maize and more.

rowConfig.visualizationAria: Interactive row configuration showing {rows} rows at {spacing}cm spacing

validation.minimumRowDistance: Minimum row distance for {seedSize} seeds is {distance}mm
validation.allRowSpacingsMinimum: All row spacings must be at least {distance}mm for {seedSize} seeds
validation.threeWheelEvenRows: 3-wheel configuration requires an even number of rows (front wheel must be centered)

recommendations.excellent: Excellent - wheels perfectly centered between rows
recommendations.good: Good - wheels well positioned between rows
recommendations.acceptable: Acceptable - minor offset from row centers
recommendations.consider: Consider adjusting row spacing for better wheel alignment
